prepared_by: Ramirez Structural Inc — Jose Ramirez, PE
description: Third typical structural details sheet with 9+ numbered details covering opening at roof/floor framing, roof/floor diaphragm assembly, top plate splice with nailing table, boring and notching limits, beam-to-post connections, beam perpendicular to wall, ceiling/joist detail, header detail with bearing and header schedule, and beam-to-beam hanger connections. APPROVED stamp by Anthony Montes - Building Plan Check.
key_content: Detail 4: Opening at roof/floor — double joists on each side of openings, Simpson U hanger each end typical, solid blocking between webs at 4' O.C.

Detail 3: Roof/floor diaphragm assembly — sheathing thickness/span/grade/nailing per plan, edge nailing at diaphragm edges, blocking at panel edges where required, 4'-0" min panel, stagger 1/8" min panel joints
Detail 2: Top plate splice — stagger joints min. 4'-0", 4'-0" min lap length at splice, nailing schedule table for plate thickness/width/design load
Detail 1: Boring and notching — notching not allowed within 1/3 span in middle, bored hole limitations per member depth
Detail 8: 4x or 6x beam to post — beam per plan, post per plan, strap per plan, A/E post cap each side, splice where occurs
Detail 12: Beam to beam hanger connection — PSL or GLB beam, Simpson GLT hanger (GLB), Simpson TW!
Detail 7: Beam perp. to wall — Simpson joist clip, top plates, post per plan, 2-2x min U.C.N., cont. dbl. top plates per plan, optional must M.U.C.N.
Detail 6: Ceiling/joist detail — 2x full ht. stud, 10d @ 8" O.C. each full height stud, post per plan, ceiling joist per plan

Detail 5: Header detail — bearing and header schedule table (opening width to header size), 4x4 at top & bottom king studs, height studs in exterior walls, 10d @ 8" O.C. each full height stud at exterior walls only
Over 2x blocking: 16d @ 8" O.C. max at accessible ceiling only
With ledger: 16d @ 8" O.C. max, 2-0#6 min on each side, see table for number of 16d toenails
Nailing: 10d @ 8" O.C. each stud recurring specification for full height stud connections
2-16d for each 2" in header depth, 3-16d for each 3" in header depth
Simpson hardware: U hanger, GLT hanger, TW!, joist clip, H/U hanger
APPROVED stamp: Anthony Montes — Building Plan Check
NOT SHOWN: holdown schedule with uplift values
NOT SHOWN: roof-to-wall connection details (hurricane ties / DTC clips)
NOT SHOWN: anchor bolt embedment depth specification

drawing_zones.content: Opening at roof/floor — double joists, Simpson U hanger, blocking at 4' O.C.
Roof/floor diaphragm assembly — sheathing, edge nailing, blocking at panel edges
Top plate splice — stagger 4' min, nailing schedule table, 4'-0" lap length
Boring and notching — notching limits within 1/3 span, bored hole limits
4x or 6x beam to post — post cap, strap, splice, beam per plan
Beam to beam hanger connection — Simpson GLT hanger, Simpson TW!, PSL/GLB beams, 4x or 6x connection
Beam perp. to wall — joist clip, top plates, over 2x blocking (16d @ 8" O.C.), with ledger, C-beam below top plates
Ceiling/joist detail — 2x full ht. stud, 10d @ 8" O.C., post per plan
Header detail — bearing and header schedule table, king studs, full height studs at exterior walls, opening stud requirements
APPROVED stamp — Anthony Montes, Building Plan Check
Title block — Ramirez Structural Inc, 326 Flint Ave, Long Beach CA 90814, Project 25-357, Sheet S3.2
